reviewText: Nikte only has a Spanish audio track. It has no subtitles either. This movie was produced by the same studio that made La Leyenda De La Nahuala and La Leyenda De La Llorona . Nikte could be compared to a classical Greek myth. In that a human relative of a god has to take a journey to do a heroic deed. Nikte is set in the ancient Mesoamerican Olmec culture. Nikte is a girl who is not content with what her average family has to offer. She literally stumbles upon some information about a prophecy. After a comet appears in the sky, Nikte makes her entrance as the "Celestial Princess" of the prophesy. Royal privileges come with a price. Two priests inform Nikte that as the "Celestial Princess" she has to retrieve something hidden somewhere in order to save the town from a looming pestilence. Nikte is helped on her perilous journey by a turkey and Chin. Chin may be someone who is called a Cheneque or a Chanekeh.
